message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this valuable product to you for $200. I think it's a great deal for something of this quality.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I believe I can find a better deal elsewhere. I am willing to pay up to $175 for the product.
Hi Bob, thanks for your counteroffer. I understand your position, but $200 is already a competitive price for this product. How about we meet in the middle at $187?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your effort to meet halfway. However, I would like to stick to my original offer of $175. I hope we can come to an agreement.
